text: Raymond H. Thompson is a professor and Arthurian scholar. ==Career== Raymond H. Thompson was brought on by Chaosium in 1997 as an editor to select and package their Pendragon fiction line. Chaosium printed only two books before they lost the rights to the line, and Green Knight Publishing picked it up. Green Knight's Pendragon fiction line's original content started appearing in 2000, and James Lowder continued to print older Arthurian works, all introduced by Thompson. ==References== ==External links== * Raymond H.
